main event: An observer reported sighting an oblong object with a dropping light in Binghamton, New York in July 1968.
interesting points: The observed object was described as moving low, then accelerating and climbing out of sight., The observer reported the weather conditions were clear during the sighting., There is no physical evidence nor photographs supporting the sighting., The object was eventually described as a glowing disc-shaped object that diminished in size before disappearing., Multiple witnesses reported similar sightings in the area.
sighted object: oblong object with a dropping light
witness description: The observer was a male, age 34, with no specific occupation mentioned.
